10 Eks Pemain Liga Indonesia yang Pernah Tampil di Piala Dunia
07 Nov 2019, 11:51 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Piala Dunia adalah turnamen sepak bola terbesar di dunia. Karena itu, bermain di turnamen empat tahunan itu menjadi impian setiap pemain sepak bola.
Bahkan megabintang Barcelona, Lionel Messi sempat berujar ingin menukar semua prestasi yang ia raih bersama klub, asalkan bisa menjuarai Piala Dunia bersama Timnas Argentina.
Para pemain yang tampil di Piala Dunia umumnya bermain di klub-klub besar Eropa. Meskipun ada yang membela klub semenjana, jarang sekali yang berasal dari kompetisi Asia Tenggara, khususnya Indonesia.
Indonesia sempat bermain di Piala Dunia 1938 di Prancis. Namun, saat itu Tim Garuda menggunakan nama Hindia Belanda. Saat itu, Hindia Belanda menjadi negara pertama dari benua Asia yang berlaga di Piala Dunia.
Sampai saat ini, tidak ada pemain yang merumput di Liga Indonesia yang mendapat panggilan membela negaranya di Piala Dunia. Namun, ada beberapa pemain bintang yang singgah di klub Indonesia setelah mencicipi panggung Piala Dunia.
Berikut ini 10 mantan pemain Liga Indonesia yang pernah berlaga di Piala Dunia seperti dilansir Bola.com.

10 Ex-Indonesian League Players Who Have Performed in the World Cup
Nov 7 2019, 11:51 by Bola.net
Bola.net - World Cup is the biggest soccer tournament in the world. Therefore, playing in the four-year tournament is a dream of every soccer player.
Even the Barcelona superstar Lionel Messi had said he wanted to exchange all the achievements he won with the club, as long as he could win the World Cup with the Argentine national team.
The players who appear in the World Cup generally play in big European clubs. Although there are those who defend the club plan, very rarely come from the Southeast Asian competition, especially Indonesia.
Indonesia played in the 1938 World Cup in France. However, at that time the Garuda Team used the name of the Dutch East Indies. At that time, the Dutch East Indies became the first country of the Asian continent to compete in the World Cup.
Until now, no player who played in the Indonesian League has received a call to defend his country at the World Cup. However, there are some star players who stopped by the Indonesian club after tasting the World Cup stage.
Here are 10 former Indonesian League players who have competed in the World Cup as reported by Bola.com.
